Figure 4.10. Comparison between standard inner/outer sets (11) (\Unique" in the  gure)
and union of inner/outer sets (14) (\Multiple"), on Pascal-VOC dataset. The dotted line is
the desired (marginal) coverage. The label index set Icontains two labels for each instance
x(see Sec. 3.1.1). A: summary box plot of coverage for each type of con dence set over 20
trials. B: cumulative distribution of the number of total con gurations in each con dence set.
C: cumulative distribution of the ratio of size of con dence sets (11) and (14) (with m= 2).
